heading: HB00503
0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE BARANGAY THROUGH SUPPORT FOR BARANGAY OFFICIALS AND VOLUNTEER WORKERS
short-title: Barangay Officials And Volunteer Workers Incentives And Benefits Act Of 1016
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00503
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE BARANGAY THROUGH SUPPORT FOR BARANGAY OFFICIALS AND VOLUNTEER WORKERS
SHORT TITLE : Barangay Officials And Volunteer Workers Incentives And Benefits Act Of 1016
ABSTRACT : Provides for the honorarium of one (1) Barangay Health Workers (BHW) and up to twenty (20) Barangay Tanods in each barangay thereby utilizing their Internal Revenue Allotment for the salary of the Punong Barangay and Kagawads, as well as, for Barangay Nutrition Scholars and members of the Lupon ng Tagapamayapa, and for other purposes.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (010 2016-08-15)2. Panotes (039 2016-10-19)
3. Espino (047 2016-11-22)4. Noel (065 2017-02-01)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2016-07-27
